00025 template <class Base>
00026 class TMultiPageDocumentWrap:
00027                      virtual public Base,
00028                      public CStandardDocumentMetaInfo,
00029                      virtual public iprm::IOptionsList
00030 {
00031 public:
00032        typedef Base BaseClass;
00033        typedef CStandardDocumentMetaInfo BaseClass2;
00034 
00035        // pseudo-reimplemented (IMultiPageDocument)
00036        virtual int GetPagesCount() const;
00037        virtual const istd::IChangeable& GetDocumentPage(int pageIndex) const;
00038        virtual const idoc::IDocumentMetaInfo* GetPageMetaInfo(int pageIndex) const;
00039        virtual void ResetPages();

00041        virtual const IDocumentMetaInfo& GetDocumentMetaInfo() const;

00053 
00054        // reimplemented (istd::IChangeable)
00055        virtual bool CopyFrom(const istd::IChangeable& object, CompatibilityMode mode = CM_WITHOUT_REFS);
00056 
00057 protected:
00058        struct Page
00059        {
00060               idoc::CStandardDocumentMetaInfo pageMetaInfo;
00061               istd::TSmartPtr<istd::IChangeable> pagePtr;
00062        };
00063 
00064 protected:
00068        virtual bool SerializePage(iser::IArchive& archive, Page& pageItem);
00069 
00070 protected:

00088 template <class Base>
00089 const istd::IChangeable& TMultiPageDocumentWrap<Base>::GetDocumentPage(int pageIndex) const
00090 {
00091        Q_ASSERT(pageIndex < m_documentPages.count());
00092        Q_ASSERT(pageIndex >= 0);
00093        Q_ASSERT(m_documentPages.at(pageIndex).pagePtr.IsValid());
00094 
00095        return *m_documentPages.at(pageIndex).pagePtr.GetPtr();
00096 }

00099 template <class Base>
00100 const idoc::IDocumentMetaInfo* TMultiPageDocumentWrap<Base>::GetPageMetaInfo(int pageIndex) const
00101 {
00102        Q_ASSERT(pageIndex < m_documentPages.count());
00103        Q_ASSERT(pageIndex >= 0);
00104 
00105        return &m_documentPages.at(pageIndex).pageMetaInfo;
00106 }

00112        istd::CChangeNotifier changePtr(this);

00114        m_documentPages.clear();

00118 template <class Base>
00119 bool TMultiPageDocumentWrap<Base>::RemovePage(int pageIndex)
00120 {
00121        Q_ASSERT(pageIndex < m_documentPages.count());
00122        Q_ASSERT(pageIndex >= 0);
00123 
00124        istd::CChangeNotifier changePtr(this);
00125 
00126        m_documentPages.remove(pageIndex);
00127 
00128        return true;

00155 template <class Base>
00156 QString TMultiPageDocumentWrap<Base>::GetOptionName(int index) const
00157 {
00158        Q_ASSERT(index < m_documentPages.count());
00159        Q_ASSERT(index>= 0);
00160 
00161        return m_documentPages[index].pageMetaInfo.GetMetaInfo(idoc::IDocumentMetaInfo::MIT_TITLE).toString();
00162 }

00186 // reimplemented (iser::ISerializable)
00187 
00188 template <class Base>
00189 bool TMultiPageDocumentWrap<Base>::Serialize(iser::IArchive& archive)
00190 {
00191        // Serialize meta info:
00192        static iser::CArchiveTag metaInfoTag("MetaInfo", "Meta information about the document");
00193        bool retVal = archive.BeginTag(metaInfoTag);
00194        retVal = retVal && BaseClass2::Serialize(archive);
00195        retVal = retVal && archive.EndTag(metaInfoTag);
00196 
00197        // Serialize document pages:
00198        static iser::CArchiveTag pagesTag("Pages", "Container of the document pages");
00199        static iser::CArchiveTag pageTag("Page", "Single document page");
00200 
00201        int pagesCount = m_documentPages.count();
00202 
00203        retVal = retVal && archive.BeginMultiTag(pagesTag, pageTag, pagesCount);
00204 
00205        if (archive.IsStoring()){
00206               for (int pageIndex = 0; pageIndex < pagesCount; ++pageIndex){
00207                      retVal = retVal && archive.BeginTag(pageTag);
00208                      retVal = retVal && SerializePage(archive, m_documentPages[pageIndex]);
00209                      retVal = retVal && archive.EndTag(pageTag);
00210               }
00211        }
00212        else{
00213               istd::CChangeNotifier changePtr(this);
00214 
00215               m_documentPages.clear();
00216 
00217               for (int pageIndex = 0; pageIndex < pagesCount; ++pageIndex){
00218                      this->InsertPage(NULL, NULL, pageIndex);
00219 
00220                      retVal = retVal && archive.BeginTag(pageTag);
00221                      retVal = retVal && SerializePage(archive, m_documentPages[pageIndex]);
00222                      retVal = retVal && archive.EndTag(pageTag);
00223               }
00224        }
00225 
00226        retVal = retVal && archive.EndTag(pagesTag);
00227 
00228        return retVal;
00229 }

00232 // reimplemented (istd::IChangeable)
00233 template <class Base>
00234 bool TMultiPageDocumentWrap<Base>::CopyFrom(const istd::IChangeable& object, CompatibilityMode mode)
00235 {
00236        const TMultiPageDocumentWrap<Base>* sourcePtr = dynamic_cast<const TMultiPageDocumentWrap<Base>*>(&object);
00237        if (sourcePtr != NULL){
00238               istd::CChangeNotifier changePtr(this);
00239 
00240               m_documentPages.clear();
00241 
00242               for (int pageIndex = 0; pageIndex < sourcePtr->m_documentPages.count(); ++pageIndex){
00243                      istd::IChangeable* pagePtr = this->InsertPage();
00244                      if (pagePtr == NULL){
00245                             return false;
00246                      }
00247 
00248                      const istd::IChangeable* sourcePagePtr = sourcePtr->m_documentPages.at(pageIndex).pagePtr.GetPtr();
00249                      Q_ASSERT(sourcePagePtr != NULL);
00250 
00251                      if (!pagePtr->CopyFrom(*sourcePagePtr)){
00252                             return false;
00253                      }
00254 
00255                      if (!m_documentPages[pageIndex].pageMetaInfo.CopyFrom(sourcePtr->m_documentPages.at(pageIndex).pageMetaInfo)){
00256                             return false;
00257                      }
00258               }
00259 
00260               if (!BaseClass2::CopyFrom(object, mode)){
00261                      return false;
00262               }
00263 
00264               return true;
00265        }
00266 
00267        return false;
00268 }

00271 // protected methods
00272 
00273 template <class Base>
00274 bool TMultiPageDocumentWrap<Base>::SerializePage(iser::IArchive& archive, Page& pageItem)
00275 {
00276        static iser::CArchiveTag pageTitleTag("PageTitle", "Title of the page");
00277        bool retVal = archive.BeginTag(pageTitleTag);
00278        retVal = retVal && pageItem.pageMetaInfo.Serialize(archive);
00279        retVal = retVal && archive.EndTag(pageTitleTag);
00280 
00281        static iser::CArchiveTag pageContentTag("PageContent", "The contents of the page");
00282 
00283        iser::ISerializable* serializablePagePtr = dynamic_cast<iser::ISerializable*>(pageItem.pagePtr.GetPtr());
00284        if (serializablePagePtr != NULL){
00285               retVal = retVal && archive.BeginTag(pageContentTag);
00286               retVal = serializablePagePtr->Serialize(archive);
00287               retVal = retVal && archive.EndTag(pageContentTag);
00288        }
00289        else{
00290               qWarning("Page object doesn't support serialization");
00291 
00292               return false;
00293        }
00294 
00295        return retVal;
00296 }
